trans-unit.source: Represents the container that handles the layout of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> 的布局的容器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> is responsible for handling placement, sizing, drag-and-drop operations, and rearranging of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>负责处理放置、 大小调整，拖放操作和重新排列的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> controls are also responsible for managing the rows (or "bands") in which <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> controls appear.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> 控件也要负责管理的行 （或"带区"），在其中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>控件显示。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> may be horizontal or vertical and, like a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>, is often docked at the top of an application window.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>可能是水平或垂直和喜欢<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Menu>，通常停靠在应用程序窗口的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>内<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A> property to place tool bars inside tool bar trays.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar.BandIndex%2A>属性将放在工具栏盘子的工具条。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The size that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> assumes to position its children.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 用于定位其子级的大小。

trans-unit.source: Called to arrange and size its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> children.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可以对其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> 子级进行排列和调整大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush to use for the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 的背景色的画笔。

trans-unit.source: A brush to use for the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 的背景色的画笔。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Background%2A> property to set the brush for the background color of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Background%2A>属性设置的背景色的画笔<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Background" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Background" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The element from which to read the property.
trans-unit.target: 从中读取属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: Reads the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked" /> property from the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 从指定元素中读取 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the toolbar cannot be moved inside the toolbar tray; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法在工具栏区内移动工具栏，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Index of the visual child.
trans-unit.target: 可见子级的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index number of the visible child.
trans-unit.target: 获取可见子级的索引号。

trans-unit.source: The index number of the visible child.
trans-unit.target: 可见子级的索引号。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> can be moved inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> 内移动 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the toolbar cannot be moved inside the toolbar tray; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法在工具栏区内移动工具栏，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This dependency property also has an attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 此依赖项属性还具有附加的属性的用法。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> that does not allow a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> to move inside it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>不允许使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>在其内部移动。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator to the logical child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 的逻辑子元素的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator to the children of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 元素的子级的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: The measurement constraints; a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> cannot return a size larger than the constraint.
trans-unit.target: 测量约束；<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 不能返回大于该约束的大小。

trans-unit.source: Called to remeasure a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法可以重新测量 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />。

trans-unit.source: The size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Drawing context to use to render the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: 要用来呈现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 的绘图上下文。

trans-unit.source: Called when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> is displayed to get the Drawing Context (DC) to use to render the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: 在显示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 时调用以获取要用来呈现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 的绘图上下文 (DC)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the orientation of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation> property to set the orientation of the tool bar tray; this determines the orientation of the tool bar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation>属性设置的方向工具栏托盘; 这将确定工具栏的方向。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.Orientation" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The element to write the property to.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中写入属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: The property value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Writes the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked" /> property to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.IsLocked" /> 属性的值写入指定元素。

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要作为子级添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不可直接在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到该对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类型或成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不可直接在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 元素集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> objects to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray> by using XAML, but do not use object element syntax.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>通过使用 XAML，但不是使用对象元素语法。

trans-unit.source: That is, do not explicitly specify the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，不显式指定<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>对象。

trans-unit.source: XAML does not support declaring generic types.
trans-unit.target: XAML 不支持声明泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *OneOrMoreToolBarElements*
trans-unit.target: *OneOrMoreToolBarElements*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.ToolBars%2A> property to add a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar> to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray.ToolBars%2A>属性来添加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of children that are currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前可见的子级数。

trans-unit.source: The number of visible <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBar" /> 中可见的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ToolBarTray" /> 对象数。
